issue.title: world frame does not go with tf across network

content.raw:
Remember that the link between the two systems is going to be limited in bandwidth and more importantly will have a huge time delay. Even if you can figure out how to get the tf packets across the wire, they will be very old. We all completed task-2 in less than half the time of the expected time delay.

I do like your setup of having two computers to test this environment. I think that I will have to setup something similar. Any sage advice on the setup.

I am also interested in the answer to Erica's question. Can you confirm that the World frame is OK on the sim computer?
